about_the_game:
This is the soundtrack for Linguist FPS. Written and performed by the game's designer Chaz Lewis. An eclectic mix of grunge rock and electronica.

Purchasing this soundtrack is a very effective way to support the development of this game and future games like it. From the bottom of our hearts we thank you.

Rocket Boy Games is a small two person indie studio based in Canberra, Australia. Our goal is to create fun alternatives to your language learning experience. This game is a very simple FPS, but with your support we'd like to expand on it in the future.
